Package ss.project.client

Class ThreadedCollectoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.project.client.ThreadedCollectoClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ThreadedCollectoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The client for Collecto. A model class as it is a part of the network communication.
    Author:
    Alex Petrov (s2478412) and Kagan Gulsum (s2596091)

      • createConnection

        public void createConnection()
                      throws ExitProgram
        Connecting to the server and setting the connectionMade flag, if the connection is established.
        Throws:
        ExitProgram - In case the client doesn't want to reconnect to the server.

      • clearConnection

        public void clearConnection()
        Clears the sockets and communication channels.
        Ensures
        this.serverSock == null && this.in == null && this.out == null

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Closes the sockets and communication channels. Resets the client.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all of the flags back to their default value.

      • handleCommand

        public void handleCommand​(java.lang.String msg)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          ServerUnavailableException
        Handles each command coming from the server. Sending them into the according handle* methods.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message from the server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case handle methods couldn't write back to the server.
        ServerUnavailableException - In case server is not available.

        To send hello to the server with the client description.

        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.
        Requires

        Throws:

        ServerUnavailableException

        Ensures

      • handleNewGame

        public void handleNewGame​(java.lang.String msg)
                   throws ProtocolException,
                          ServerUnavailableException
        To process the NEWGAME message from the server.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message from the server
        Throws:
        ProtocolException - In case the server violates the protocol.
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.
        Requires
        msg != null
        Ensures
        theBoard will be created in accordance to the server's message., The players will be correctly assigned with the turns decided.

      • playerCreation

        public void playerCreation​(java.lang.String user1,
                           java.lang.String user2)
                    throws ServerUnavailableException
        To create players in accordance with the NEWGAME message.
        Parameters:
        user1 - The first player's username.
        user2 - The second player's username.
        level - Client's AI level.
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.

      • sendMove

        public void sendMove​(int move1,
                     int move2)
              throws ServerUnavailableException
        To send the move to the server.
        Parameters:
        move1 - The first move
        move2 - The second move
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.
        Requires
        move1 >= 0 && 27 >= move1 && move2 >= -1 && 27 >= move2

      • validMoveType

        public boolean validMoveType​(int move1,
                             int move2)
        A helper method for sending a move that makes the first checks.
        Parameters:
        move1 - The first move
        move2 - The second move
        Returns:
        true if the move passes method's checks, false otherwise.

      • sendAiMove

        public void sendAiMove()
                throws ServerUnavailableException
        To send an AI move automatically. Invoked after handleMove, and handleNewGame (if the AI is first to play).
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.

      • handleMove

        public void handleMove​(int move1,
                       int move2)
                throws ServerUnavailableException
        To process move messages coming from the server. The client also checks the moves legality in this method, and sends appropriate error messages in case the server sent an illegal move. The method also handles confirmation moves through a flag called lastPlayedMove.
        Parameters:
        move1 - The first move
        move2 - The second move
        Throws:
        ServerUnavailableException - In case the server is not available.
        Requires
        move1 >= 0 && 27 >= move1 && move2 >= -1 && 27 >= move2

      • doHint

        public void doHint()
        To give a hint to the client who is struggling to find a legal move.

        Throws:

        Requires
